cast.name: 瓦内萨·马歇尔 Vanessa Marshall
詹姆斯·阿诺德·泰勒 James Arnold Taylor
大卫·索博洛夫 David Sobolov

this_title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes - Guardians of the Galaxy: The Thanos Threat
trans_title: 乐高漫威超级英雄：银河护卫队之灭霸危机
introduction: The LEGO Group and Marvel will team-up once again for an all-new 22-minute animated special LEGO Marvel Super Heroes – Guardians of the Galaxy: The Thanos Threat. When Thanos, Ronan, Nebula and the Ravagers seek to possess the Build Stone – a powerful and creative relic – the fate of the universe depends on the Guardians of the Galaxy to protect it. The platform and release timing details are forthcoming.
chinese_title: 乐高漫威超级英雄：银河护卫队之灭霸危机
foreign_title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes - Guardians of the Galaxy: The Thanos Threat
